alert.note: Alert for Gogebic; Ontonagon (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 12 at 3:23PM EST until January 14 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST /MIDNIGHT CST/ SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 10 to 21 inches. The highest accumulations will be across the higher terrain from Ironwood to the Porcupine Mountains and lowest farther inland and immediately along the Lake Superior shoreline. Winds gusting as high as 35 to 45 mph, strongest near the Lake Superior shoreline. * WHERE...Ontonagon and Gogebic Counties. * WHEN...Until 1 AM EST /midnight CST/ Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blizzard conditions will be possible at times tonight into early Saturday morning, especially along the Lake Superior shoreline.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
